item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18904)
item.content:encoded:

Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `

Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry

  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.title: 10 years ago, we were honoring the life of Alonzo Ashely. Today...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

10 years ago, we were honoring the life of Alonzo Ashely. Today we come back to the same place to keep honoring his life and supporting his family. It doesnâ€™t matter how much time passes by, we will keep remembering the life of every person of color, black and brown, that has been killed in the hands of police. One day we will end with this practice of abuse, creating legislations to take away the protection of all those corrupt police officers that think that just because they have a badge, it gives them permission to kill our people. Marking the life of families, we will keep marching in the streets to end police brutality.

item.title: Hello Denver and beyond, please make sure you mark your...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Hello Denver and beyond, please make sure you mark your calendarâ€˜s for this Friday, October 1 from 4 to 6 PM.

Here is what happened:
Alanzo Ashley was at the zoo with his family in 2011. This man began to visibly display symptoms of heat strokeï¿¼ï¿¼ï¿¼. Alonzo should have been treated with medical care by Zoo staff and any other responding personnel, instead Denver police were called and when they arrived they tackled him and used a taser when they did not need to and as a result... his heart stopped.

Who took responsibility:
After a 10 year up hill battle with no one from the city or the zoo even offering as little as an apology to the family in the mourning or a community in outrageï¿¼. After a law suit and many years of protesting outside of the zoo, after distributing water bottles and information regarding what happened.ï¿¼ï¿¼

October 1st from 4:00 - 6:00:
The zoo staff coordinated by Dr. Mosby Tyler have been working with ï¿¼the family, around the development of a water fountain and cooling station in memory of Alonzo Ashley. This memorial will be unveiled this Friday, October 1 between 4 PM and 6 PM. Friends Family and Community are welcomeï¿¼ï¿¼, Zoo admission will be free to those who attend.

Link to event here:

https://facebook.com/events/s/in-memory-of-alonzo-ashley/541435653623950/

item.title: Maria is cooking with us for the first time this week! She was...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Maria is cooking with us for the first time this week! She was featured in the documentary about Solidarity Meals from @wastelandofwonder, check it out to see her and her daughter Edna in the kitchen. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co, and we always appreciate yâ€™all liking, sharing, and saving our posts to help spread the word.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoTania has been working towards obtaining her residency so she can stay in Denver with her...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

Tania has been working towards obtaining her residency so she can stay in Denver with her children, mother, and siblings. She has built a life here with her fam...ily and they all plan to stay! Support her legal costs by getting some of her enchiladas this Saturday! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/
